dialog.description:
The Paystreak Casino in Las Vegas is under attack. A hacker is attempting to gain access to online gambling accounts and is using four attack hubs located around the city.
Take out the attacking hubs by selecting them and then correctly answering the questions. All four hubs must be taken offline before the casino's defenses are depleted.
Good Luck!
(Click to Begin)
dialog.levelSuccess:
Congratulations! You have successfully protected the casino's online accounts.
Unfortunately, the hacker escaped before being apprehended, and we believe that he is already planning another attack.
There is no time for celebration. We must locate and stop the hacker from striking again.
(Click to Continue)
dialog.levelFailure:
You have failed to protect the casino's online accounts.
The hacker was able to penetrate the network and steal account information of thousands of customers. The casino is now forced to reimburse customers for their losses and make costly improvements to their network defenses.
There is no time to rest. You should improve your skills and prepare yourself to try and stop the hacker once again.
(Click to Replay)
